p: The CEO extraction was performed according to the hydrodistillation method, which is known as one of the famous, routine, and official standard procedures to extract and control the quality of EOs of medicinal herbs (Taherpour et al., 2017). For the extraction of CEO, the chicory was dried, powdered, and added to the Clevenger device (containing 50 g powder in 750 ml distilled water). The extraction process was performed for 3 hr at 335 power, according to a method reported by Heydari et al. ( 2020), with some changes. The oil (CEO) was then collected, dehydrated, and stored at 4°C.
